Leah, 
Please take messages like these to private email to someone. Frank a=
nd Chris are fine. This board is for evp-itc discussion only. Thanks for yo=
ur support in keeping this board a friendly sharing place.
Moderator



---=
-- Original Message ----
From: Leah <leahsodyssey@...>
To: EVP-ITC@ya=
hoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, June 12, 2008 1:00:50 PM
Subject: [EVP-ITC] F=
rank's Box and Chris Moon


I am concerend because Chris Moon is using Fran=
k's box under his name to make money. He 
charges $250 for a half hour sess=
ion with this box. I wouldn't be so irritated had he just 
called it someth=
ing else, but this is Frank's and it should be up to Frank how this box is =
used. 
I think using it to make money is wrong. I am not saying it would be=
 wrong for Frank to 
market it it, at a reasonable price, but to charge $25=
0 for a session that is under the 
interpretation of Chris Moon is just pla=
ying on those who are suffering from a loss and 
looking for a connection.
=

<html><head><style type="text/css"><!-- DIV {margin:0px;} --></style></head><body><div style="font-family:times new roman, new york, times, serif;font-size:14pt"><P>Leah, </P>
<P>Please take messages like these to private email to someone. Frank and Chris are fine. This board is for evp-itc discussion only. Thanks for your support in keeping this board a friendly sharing place.</P>
<P>Moderator</P>
<DIV style="FONT-SIZE: 14pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman, new york, times, serif"><BR><BR>
<DIV style="PADDING-LEFT: 5px; FONT-SIZE: 12pt; MARGIN: 5px 0px 5px 5px; BORDER-LEFT: #1010ff 2px solid; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman, new york, times, serif">----- Original Message ----<BR>From: Leah <leahsodyssey@...><BR>To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com<BR>Sent: Thursday, June 12, 2008 1:00:50 PM<BR>Subject: [EVP-ITC] Frank's Box and Chris Moon<BR><BR>
<DIV id=ygrp-text>
<P>I am concerend because Chris Moon is using Frank's box under his name to make money. He <BR>charges $250 for a half hour session with this box. I wouldn't be so irritated had he just <BR>called it something else, but this is Frank's and it should be up to Frank how this box is used. <BR>I think using it to make money is wrong. I am not saying it would be wrong for Frank to <BR>market it it, at a reasonable price, but to charge $250 for a session that is under the <BR>interpretation of Chris Moon is just playing on those who are suffering from a loss and <BR>looking for a connection.<BR><BR></P></DIV></DIV></DIV></div><br>

      </body></html>
